DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to change the concentration of amyloid-beta in human cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) through modulation of the sleep-wake cycle.
DOC.brief_title: Modulation of CSF Amyloid-beta Concentrations Via Behavioral Sleep Deprivation and Pharmacological Sleep Induction
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this research study is to investigate whether or not increasing or decreasing duration of sleep over one night will change the concentration of amyloid-beta in cerebral spinal fluid (CSF).
